other_information: For local restrictions see LKTRA31 (AIP CR ENR 5.2). Snow clearance is not provided. A restricted usability of RWY after a spring snow melting. The traffic circuits Carry out the traffic circuits to the south. The traffic circuit altitude is 2400 ft / 730 m AMSL. The minimum final turn altitude is 2050 ft / 620 m AMSL. Noise abatement procedures After take off from RWY 26 turn heading 180° as soon as possible with with regard to safety to avoid of build up area. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION NIL CHARGES FOR AERODROMES Landing charges Per tonne of MTOW 50,00 Parking charges NIL Charges for passenger service NIL Chapter end Intentionally left blank
